request.description: Get a SalesActivity entity by Id
Get all of the Sales Activity entities
Gets all of the Sales Activities from an order

body.raw:
{
	"entityView":{
"Name": "RequestRma",
"DisplayName": "RequestRma",
"EntityId": "{{OrderId}}",
"Action": "ValidateRmaRequest",
"ItemId": "{{LineId}}",
"Properties": [
{
"Name": "Version",
"DisplayName": "Version",
"Value": "5",
"IsHidden": true,
"OriginalType": "System.Int32",
"IsReadOnly": true,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "ParentId",
"DisplayName": "Parent Id",
"Value": "{{OrderId}}",
"IsHidden": true,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": true,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "ItemId",
"DisplayName": "Item Id",
"Value": "{{LineId}}",
"IsHidden": true,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": true,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "RmaReason",
"Policies": [
{
"@odata.type": "#Sitecore.Commerce.Core.AvailableSelectionsPolicy",
"PolicyId": "66f7a59cb1a74c7d97aaae987f1979e3",
"Models": [],
"RuleSet": null,
"List": [
{
"Name": "WrongItem",
"DisplayName": "The wrong item was sent",
"IsDefault": false
},
{
"Name": "DidNotLike",
"DisplayName": "Customer did not like item",
"IsDefault": false
}
],
"AllowMultiSelect": false
}
],
"DisplayName": "Reason",
"Value": "DidNotLike",
"IsHidden": false,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": false,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "Quantity",
"DisplayName": "Quantity",
"Value": "1.0",
"IsHidden": false,
"OriginalType": "System.Decimal",
"IsReadOnly": false,
"IsRequired": true
}
],
"DisplayRank": 500,
"UiHint": "Flat"
}
}

{
    "entityView": {
        "Name": "RequestRma",
        "DisplayName": "Request Rma",
        "EntityId": "{{OrderId}}",
        "Action": "RequestRma",
        "ItemId": "{{LineId}}",
        "Properties": [
            {
                "Name": "Version",
                "DisplayName": "Version",
                "Value": "4",
                "IsHidden": true,
                "OriginalType": "System.Int32",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {

                "DisplayName": "Parent Id",

            },
            {

                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "RmaReason",
                "DisplayName": "Reason",
                "Value": "DidNotLike",
                "IsHidden": true,
                "OriginalType": "System.String",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "Quantity",
                "DisplayName": "Quantity",
                "Value": "1.0",
                "IsHidden": true,
                "OriginalType": "System.Decimal",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "RefundTotal",
                "DisplayName": "RefundTotal",
                "Value": "49.23000",
                "IsHidden": false,
                "OriginalType": "System.Decimal",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "RmaRequestValidReason",
                "DisplayName": "RmaRequestValidReason",
                "Value": "Return can be requested.",
                "IsHidden": false,
                "OriginalType": "System.String",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "CanRequestRma",
                "DisplayName": "CanRequestRma",
                "Value": "True",
                "IsHidden": false,
                "OriginalType": "System.Boolean",
                "IsReadOnly": true,
                "IsRequired": true
            },
            {
                "Name": "WantToContinue",
                "DisplayName": "WantToContinue",
                "Value": "True",
                "IsHidden": false,
                "OriginalType": "System.Boolean",
                "IsReadOnly": false,
                "IsRequired": true
            }
        ],
        "DisplayRank": 500,
        "UiHint": "Flat"
    }
}
